name: Cars (itch) (CST1229)
description:
Itch version of the game, which previously was a Google Drive download.

By CST1229

Made in Game Maker Studio
---------------
A game based off of a Formula 1 game on an old flipphone i have.
Unrelated to the movie of the same name.
Credits, and controls are in the help menu.
Enjoy!
------------------
SOURCE:
The game's GMZ is in a separate download. Use it, mod it or whatever but please credit me and don't claim as your own.
